description: - 安装：yarn add webpack-dev-server -D - 启动： npx webpack-dev-server - 配置服务器 webpack.config.js ```  devServer: {         port: 3000,         contentBase: './dist',         progress: true,         open: false,     } ``` - 配置执行脚本 package.json ``` script: {     dev: "webpack-dev-server" } ```
